about_the_game:
Explore the high seas with this highly customizable ship tileset for RPG Maker! Design your own ship layouts, east-west or north-south…whatever works for you!

This Ship Tileset Includes:

Ground and wall tiles:

Wood paneling and grates for a simple, reliable fantasy look, plus water.

Ship structure:

railing pieces
figurehead
portholes and other windows
mast and sails
stairs in various directions
crow’s nest
rat lines
ladders
and more!
Just draw your floor and upper wall tiles in the shape of the ship’s levels, then add the bow pieces to cap around it!

Other accessories:

doors
lifeboats
crates and barrels
harpoon
fishing poles
cannons
anchors
ropes
cabin furniture
hammocks and beds
brig tiles
and more!

Animations ready-to-use in events:

normal doors and cell doors
white flags in 3 directions
large, medium and small sails
splashes to go around the ship


Includes sample maps to demonstrate layouts and event placement.
